comment._content: This image has been used in the indicommons.org post: Henry Ossawa Tanner

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Henry Ossawa Tanner (June 21, 1859–May 25, 1937) was an African American artist best known for his paintings of religious subjects, genre scenes, and portraits. He was the first African American painter to gain international acclaim. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Ossawa_Tanner
